dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3839 IH: EO 14155 Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, Intelligence (Permanent Select), and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14155 (relating to withdrawing the United States from the World Health Organization).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the EO 14155 Act of 2025.

section.header: Codification of Executive Order 14155, withdrawing the United States from the World Health Organization
section.text: Executive Order 14155 (XX Fed. Reg. XXXX; Withdrawing the United States From the World Health Organization) shall have the force and effect of law.
